PIN.values: |SwipeButton is spreadable by Transforms and it's quad with no alpha accurate!&cr;&lf;It filtering and sorting all touches and returns intersect results for given transforms:&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;IsPressed = a new touch started on the quad and it marked as pressed until the touch dissapear&cr;&lf;Object Hit = any touches intersect with quad&cr;&lf;Swipe = bang on a direction swipe (SwipeThreshold pin to tune)&cr;&lf;TouchPositionXY = touch position on the quad (!!!Hardly spreadable atm!!!) &cr;&lf;OffsetXY = touch offset started from touch init point (!!!Hardly spreadable atm!!!)&cr;&lf;|
|Swipes match to users expectations about swipe gesture. Send this to Logic.&cr;&lf;DO NOT DO LOGIC HERE!|
|Position & Offset are hardly spreadable (sorry!) but might be used for nice sliders still! Look for examples in Sliders section.|
|Animation after touch only! &cr;&lf;You won't need FrameDelay in that case!|
